column4: if you don't have much experience on the commandline, dont use arch.
Or be prepared to learn very quickly how to use terminal, because you'll have to.
I have pretty good experience with terminal.
but I am not sure what level.

arch is a really nice system. It's one where you must tweak and tinker in order to build your system up. It's simple in its engineering. It's very low profile. If that interests you, then try it. If you want a system that works very well out of the box with minimal configuration, then choose ubuntu or its children.
